title: Part A
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not state that the country could implement one of the following fiscal policy actions: increase government spending, increase transfer payments, or decrease taxes.
The response states that the country could implement one of the following fiscal policy actions: increase government spending, increase transfer payments, or decrease taxes.

descriptions: The response does not accurately include either of the criteria below.

title: Part C
